original_title: Tha Real Hustle & Flow of the South
overview: This documentary examines how rap artists have converted the hometown of Elvis -- Memphis, Tenn. -- into a thriving center of hip-hop music. In addition to exploring the Memphis hip-hop scene from the street level, the program also highlights the skills necessary to succeed in the music game. Included are concert footage and music videos from platinum recording artists Three 6 Mafia, Juvenile, Young Buck and C-Murder.
title: Tha Real Hustle & Flow of the South
